headline: Your Future Boss is One Click Away
tagline: A clean, modern resume site that makes recruiters say “Wow, who’s this genius?”
about: I'm a results-driven unicorn disguised as a job seeker. I turn coffee into code, ideas into products, and weekends into portfolio updates. Looking to join a team that appreciates GIFs in Slack and big picture thinking.

services.name: Full Stack Development
services.description: From pixel-perfect UIs to bug-squashing backend logic, I build web apps that work, scale, and impress.

services.name: Data Analysis
services.description: I turn messy data into crisp insights, with graphs that even your CEO will understand.

services.name: Data Science & Analytics
services.description: Finding insights like a truffle pig in a forest of numbers.

education.degree: Bachelor of Magic in Software Engineering
education.activities: Captain of the Quidditch Analytics Club
